name: Manual required - security issue
description: Security issues should require manual review

input.title: SQL injection vulnerability in user input
input.body:
## Description
The application is vulnerable to SQL injection in the login form.

## Steps to Reproduce
1. Go to login page
2. Enter `' OR '1'='1` as username
3. Access granted without valid credentials

## Impact
Attackers can bypass authentication and access sensitive data.
